Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga took 3/21 and 2 catches to help Sri Lanka win by 5 wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Wanindu Hasaranga was awarded the Player of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets (with 18 balls remaining)
The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium on September 09, 2022
Others: Pramod Madushan made his T20I debut in this match
